text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: On the third line of the text, who is "retainer" referring to? Special Week-san?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah, yes! ……yes?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …"myself", it's referring to "myself".

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yourself……? Aaah! Yes, it's King-chan!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's not what I meant!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Special Week-san, King Halo-san, extra homework for both of you.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Fuu～, thanks for the meal～. Really, yams are the best, aren't they～?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, are you okay…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, No! There's nothing wrong! Forget about that, before my food gets cold I need to eat!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …h-huh?! My food's completely gone?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: No, didn't you just wolf it down and finish way faster than me…?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's get started with today's training!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Heck yeah! If Spe's showing us that she's this motivated, we need to put in some spirit too, don't we?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! If she's going to wear her Race Uniform during training, it's pretty obvious how serious Spe-chan is!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Racing Uniform……?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah?! I put on the wrong clothes!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: It was a mistake?! It's a mistake?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan……
Looks like you spoke to Spe about going overseas.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yesterday night. She was really shocked though……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Looks like I don't even need anymore explanation for why she's so flustered.
I had heard from Silence Suzuka that she wanted to head overseas around New Year's.
Seeing her like this, it was easy to see that her victories in the Twinkle Series had made her curious about the challenges that would await her overseas.
Since she was aiming even higher, as a Trainer, I had no reason to stop her, I should cheer her on as best I can, though―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To part ways with Suzuka-san who's been with her since she transferred, it's not unexpected that she'd be so shaken, however…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ……Um, Trainer-san……
Silence Suzuka's expression clearly showed she felt like she was responsible. However, she has her own feelings to think about as well―
I can guess what you want to say Suzuka, but the team and I will support Spe, so everything will be fine.
I can guess what you want to say Suzuka, but the team and I will support Spe, so everything will be fine.
Alright, since Spe is already in her Racing Uniform, today let's have everyone do training today in their Race Uniforms!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, that sounds like fun, doesn't it? They'll probably say is starting something weird again, though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san… supporting Uma Musume so they can take hold of their dreams, is what team is all about.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Supporting, so they can take hold of their dreams……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well then, Suzuka-san let's change in to our Racing Uniforms too. Let's get you properly fired up for your overseas adventure.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah, you're right.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'll go see all of that "scenery" too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Alright then, let's finish up with one more lap.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Fuu～, today we ran quite a lot too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Everyone, good work……

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa…… haa…… haa…… haa……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Suzuka-san's running, it hasn't changed from when I first saw it……)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I want to become like Suzuka-san too…… That's why, I wanted to see more of Suzuka-san's running)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (…… but, Suzuka-san is going overseas……)
